Articles.Content:
Not my problem, but a friend's (they don't have a forum account.)

Since updating to 0.25 via the Launcher/Patcher, all parts that have had their properties/configurations changed, there are duplicates, one the new part, the other the old. Is there any way to fix this besides manually deleting all the duplicates/downloading a new save? Not much of a problem but I thought Squad might want to know about it.
Delete parts folder and re run patcher. Worked for me, Claw told to do that.

Delete parts folder and re run patcher. Worked for me, Claw told to do that.

Seconded. This is pretty much the only way to do it without re-downloading the entire KSP game.
Yeah, this happened because Squad reorganised the Parts folder for 0.25. This is, I think, the second time this has happened. They really ought to be more careful, ehe.
